DOC.brief_summary: INVESTIGATE THE EFFECT OF A 12-WEEK CONSUMPTION PERIOD OF SINGLE DOSE A DAY OF A PLANT STEROLS-ENRICHED FERMENTED DAIRY PRODUCT ON BLOOD LIPOPROTEIN PROFILE IN JAPANESE ADULTS WITH HIGH LDL-C .
DOC.brief_title: `` A Clinical Study Evaluating Effect Plant Sterol-enriched Fermented Dairy Product Blood Lipoprotein Profile Japanese Adults ''
DOC.criteria: An individual must fulfil follow criterion order eligible trial enrolment To check inclusion visit ( V1 ) : II 01 : Male/female subject , age 20 75 year ( bound include ) . II 02 : Subject body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 kg/m2 ( bound include ) 30 kg/m2 ( bound exclude ) . II 03 : Subject LDLcholesterol blood level 120 mg/dL ( 3.1 mmol/L ) 160 mg/dL ( 4.14 mmol/L ) ( bound include ) . II 04 : Subject triglyceride 200 mg/dL ( 2.3 mmol/L ) . II 05 : Non hypertensive subject define Systolic Blood Pressure ( SBP ) < 140 mmHg Diastolic Blood Pressure ( DBP ) < 90 mmHg OR subject treat controlled hypertension define SBP < 140 mmHg DBP < 90 mmHg since least 1 month . II 06 : Subject already receive dietary recommendation advisable hyper borderline hyperLDL cholesterolemic subject ( accord Japan Atherosclerosis Society guideline ) . II 07 : Subject agree consume supplements/ food product enrich plant sterol plant stanols form soy milk product study period . II 08 : Female subject must postmenopausal least 12 month prior trial entry surgically sterile ( i.e . hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy bilateral tubal ligation ) OR child bear potential , female subject must use comply one follow medically approve method contraception , exclusively : Oral birth control pill ( least 1 full monthly cycle prior study product administration ) ; Intrauterine device ( IUD ) ; Double barrier method ( condom spermicide ) ; Abstinence , opinion investigator , occupation life style give efficient evidence abstinence maintain throughout study one month thereafter . II 09 : Subject cover social security cover similar system . II 10 : Subject , upon brief content present study , fully understand agree objective ; able personally sign write informed consent . II 11 : Subject give write ( date sign ) inform consent take part study . II 12 : Asian subject originate Japan . II 13 : Subject able communicate well investigator comply requirement entire study . II 14 : Subject fridge home study product storage sufficient capacity . To check randomization visit ( V2 ) : RI 01 : Subject LDLcholesterol blood level 120 mg/dL ( 3.1 mmol/L ) 160 mg/dL ( 4.14 mmol/L ) ( bound include ) . RI 02 : Subject triglyceride 200 mg/dL ( 2.3 mmol/L ) . RI 03 : Subject compliance product runin period 80 % . RI 04 : Subject follow dietary recommendation advisable hypercholesterolaemic patient . An individual fulfilling follow criterion exclude trial enrolment To check inclusion visit ( V1 ) : IE 01 : Subject hypocholesterolaemic treatment . IE 02 : Subjects stop take hypocholesterolemic drug product ( statin , ezetimibe , sequesterants , niacin , nicotinates , probucol , omega3 fatty acid ( EPADHA , ALAâ€¦ ) , fibrates ) less 3 month ago . IE 03 : Subject know allergy hypersensitivity plant sterols component study product ( milk protein example ) . IE 04 : Subjects sitosterolemia . IE 05 : Subject experience cardiovascular event ( cardiac infarction , angina attack , surgical endoscopic coronary angioplasty , stroke , arterial disease , etc. ) . IE 06 : Subject suffer serious chronic liver , renal , cardiovascular , respiratory , endocrine metabolic disorder . IE 07 : Subject gastrointestinal disorder ( diarrhoea , constipation , irritable bowel syndrome ) use laxative . IE 08 : Subject diabetes Type I Type II Fasting Blood Sugar test ( FBS ) > 125 mg/dL ( 7.0 mmol/L ) screen visit . IE 09 : Subject surgery intervention require general anesthesia precede 4 week , plan one course study . IE 10 : Subject receiving ( currently 4 last week ) systemic treatment topical treatment likely interfere evaluation study parameter . IE 11 : Subject involved clinical study within precede month exclusion period another clinical study . IE 12 : Subject blood sample 200 mL take ( e.g. , donate blood ) within 1 month , 400 mL within 3 month start present study . IE 13 : Subject heavy alcohol intake ( > 60 g/day ) . IE 14 : Subject take treatment anorexia , weight loss , form treatment likely interfere metabolism dietary habit ( e.g . hypolipemic , hypoglycaemic treatment ) . IE 15 : For female subject : pregnant woman woman plan become pregnant study ; breastfeed woman . IE 16 : For female subject : subject likely change contraceptive method hormone replacement therapy study . IE 17 : Subject situation , investigator 's opinion could interfere optimal participation present study ( e.g . nondairyproducts consumer ) could constitute special risk subject . IE 18 : Subject susceptible comply dietary qualitative restriction study period . IE 19 : Vulnerable subject define individual whose willingness volunteer clinical trial may unduly influenced expectation , whether justify , benefit associate participation , retaliatory response senior member hierarchy case refusal participate . Examples member group hierarchical structure , medical , pharmacy , dental nursing student , subordinate hospital laboratory personnel , employee pharmaceutical industry , member arm force , person keep detention . IE 20 : Subjects know lactose intolerance know allergy plant sterol . IE 21 : Subjects heavy soybean milk consumer . IE 22 : Subject expect living home current participate subject concomitantly receive study product .
DOC.keyword: Japanese Subjects , High LDL-C , fermented-dairy product , phytosterols
